name: top-down-2D
description:
Install instructions

Top-down-2D

Creation of a project aimed at teaching us to code the basic movements of a top down game (use the arrow keys to move forward / spacebar to roll)

To try the prototype: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/webgl-builds-295404

to see the source code: https://github.com/Tatiana-pct/top-down-2D
